contents.content: UNIT 01 求职准备 Job Hunting Preparation
Lesson 5 推荐工作 Recommending a Job
杰克和玛丽在谈论推荐工作。

contents.title: 杰克：玛丽，似乎最近你的家人和朋友经常给你打电话，是吧？
contents.answer: Jack: Mary, it seems that your family and friends have been calling you recently, am I right?

contents.title: 玛丽：是的，他们一直都很关心我找工作的情况。
contents.answer: Mary: Yes, they have been concerned about me finding a job.

contents.title: 杰克：他们都说什么了？
contents.answer: Jack: What do they say?

contents.title: 玛丽：他们说想给我推荐几份工作。
contents.answer: Mary: They want to recommend some jobs to me.

contents.content: 虽然有些求职者也煞费苦心地努力找工作，却收效甚微，找不到令自己满意的工作。这时候，如果有谁来推荐工作，就算是帮了大忙了。

contents.title: 杰克：是吗？都是什么工作啊？
contents.answer: Jack: Really? What jobs are they?

contents.title: 玛丽：我爸爸想让我去他所在的公司实习。
contents.answer: Mary: My father wants me to work as a trainee in his company.

contents.title: 杰克：挺好的呀！
contents.answer: Jack: It's great!

contents.title: 玛丽：我姑姑说她公司现在缺个助理，让我去试试。
contents.answer: Mary: My aunt says her company is in need of an assistant now, and she wants me to give it a try..

contents.title: 杰克：这是个好机会。
contents.answer: Jack: This is a good opportunity.

contents.title: 玛丽：我的一个朋友说现在他的公司在大量招人，想让我去面试一下。
contents.answer: Mary: One of my friends tells me that his company is hiring in a large scale and he wants me to go for an interview.

contents.content: 找工作不仅仅是求职者自己的事情，相关的亲朋好友都会献计献策，帮忙推荐合适的工作。毕竟他们已经在社会上工作了许久，经验和人脉都比较丰富。如果有他们帮忙，找起工作来就会轻松许多，而且他们推荐的工作比较知根知底，相比而言还是安全可靠的。

contents.title: 杰克：你可以去试试！说不定会成功呢。
contents.answer: Jack: You can give it a try! May be you will succeed.

contents.title: 玛丽：我知道，让我再好好想想。
contents.answer: Mary: I know. Let me think it over.

contents.title: 杰克：有什么好工作记得帮我留意一下啊！
contents.answer: Jack: If you have any good jobs, keep an eye for me!

contents.title: 玛丽：那是一定了。
contents.answer: Mary: I will.

contents.content: 许多学校也非常关注毕业生的就业情况，因为毕业生的就业率在某种程度上也关乎学校的声誉和招生情况，因此许多高校会专门设立就业指导中心，为学生提供大量的就业信息。在临近毕业的时候，学校也会组织招聘会和其他活动，以便为毕业生推荐工作。

contents.title: 1.我的家人都积极向我推荐工作。
contents.answer: My families are all actively recommending jobs to me.

contents.title: 2.我的朋友给我推荐了一份工作。
contents.answer: My friend has recommended a job to me.

contents.title: 3.学校有义务为学生推荐工作。
contents.answer: The schools are under obligations to recommend jobs to their students.

contents.title: 4.有些大学只为优秀毕业生推荐工作。
contents.answer: Some universities only recommend jobs to outstanding graduates.

contents.title: 5.他认为这份工作很适合我，所以极力向我推荐。
contents.answer: He thinks this job fi ts me well, so he has recommended it to me highly.

contents.title: 6.他们急着招聘人员，因此推荐我去试试。
contents.answer: They are urgently hiring staff members, so they recommended me to give it a try.

contents.title: 7.他们会先看你的简历，然后再为你推荐合适的工作。
contents.answer: They will read your resume first, and then recommend suitable jobs for you.

contents.title: 8.他给我推荐的工作是当个编辑。
contents.answer: The job he recommends to me is to be an editor.

contents.title: 9.国家设立了专门机构为毕业生推荐工作。
contents.answer: The country has set up special agencies to recommend jobs for graduates.

contents.title: 10.对于别人推荐的工作要仔细斟酌。
contents.answer: You should carefully consider others' recommendations of jobs.
